name: WiOn
0:
”Alexa, turn on name”
”Alexa, turn off name”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your WiOn switch with you voice using Amazon Alexa. It will work with WiOn switch family products, such as in-wall light switch, indoor use smart outlet, outdoor light control, smart switch surge protector, smart yard stake, smart box etc. Just ask Alexa to turn on or off any lamp that you plug into WiOn products, such as appliances, game systems, fans, pool pumps & heaters, irrigation systems, and even seasonal lighting. To learn more about WiOn products, please visit: www.wionproducts.com

To get started, you need to use the WiOn app to connect your WiOn devices to your home network and give them a distinct name. Then tap the setting of WiOn app, select “Connect to Amazon Alexa”, input your Alexa account, the device will join into the Alexa, then you open the Alexa app, select the Smart Home to check the WiOn device.

After Alexa discovers your device, just say “Alexa, turn ON or turn OFF <device name>” to control your devices

For any question or support, please click on WiOn app > More > FAQ.
